name: One Button Maze
description:
You think that this game is very easy as it is only a maze game that having a 10*12 procedural generated map!? Then you may totally wrong!!

In this game, every round, the goal of you is goto the red point in the left side, BUT!! With only that button...

In this game, you can't 100% decide when and where you can go, just like your life sometimes...

What you can do is to wait the direction you need (such as left, right, top, down) appear under "action:" and press the button at the right time,

While it is given to you randomly, no matter the direction and period between it change...

The world is totally unfair, you friends may have a lot of round with easy map, better period of direction change and the types of direction appeared when they needed it,

while you may got a exhausting map,  period of direction change that faster than your reaction time and need to wait a lot until you can get the direction you need...

You are recommended to share your score with your friends.

Currently features of this game:

  1. 10*12 procedural generated map of maze.
  2. Able to start a new round after finished the previous one in-game.
  3.  In-game timer.
  4. Only one button In-game.

Planned features of this game:

  1. Better GUI. (e.g. color and font of text)
  2. Adjust the difficulty.

Known issues:

  1. May cause pain to eyes after playing this game for a while, highly recommended you to blink your eyes and take a rest frequently.

*A game for the 1-Button Jam 2019.

Recommended system requirements: Operating system:Windows 7 or higher CPU:Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4170 or better RAM:1GB or higher storage:10MB or higher

Please report to me if you found any bug(s) in this game!

Patreon link: https://www.patreon.com/thelssoftware

Have fun!
